Joe Thornton

Full Name: Joseph Eric Thornton

(Jumbo, Jumbo Joe, Big Bird, Big Joe)

Position: C •  Shoots: Left

6-4, 220lb (193cm, 99kg)

Born: July 2, 1979 in London, Ontario ca

Draft: Boston, 1st round (1st overall), 1997 NHL Entry

Amateur Teams: Sault Ste. Marie Greyhounds

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player 2025 (Full List)

Pronunciation: \JOH THOHRN-tuhn\

Relatives: Cousin Scott Thornton

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Joe Thornton?

Joe Thornton is 46 years old.

When was Joe Thornton born?

Joe Thornton was born on July 2, 1979.

Where was Joe Thornton born?

Joe Thornton was born in London, Canada.

How tall is Joe Thornton?

Joe Thornton is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much did Joe Thornton weigh when playing?

Joe Thornton weighed 220 lbs (99 kg) when playing.

Is Joe Thornton in the Hockey Hall of Fame?

Joe Thornton was elected into the Hockey Hall of Fame as a Player in 2025.

How many goals did Joe Thornton have?

Joe Thornton had 430 goals over his career.

How many points did Joe Thornton have?

Joe Thornton had 1,539 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Joe Thornton won?

Joe Thornton has never won a Stanley Cup as a player.

When did Joe Thornton retire?

Joe Thornton last played in 2022.
